introduction.p1: I am a Software Engineer with a keen interest in interdisciplinary understanding of electrical and computer science. I my undergraduate in Electrical & Electronics Engineering from BITS Pilani K.K. Birla Goa Campus.
introduction.p2: My main interest lies in creating new and unique solutions to the modern world problems while researching Human-Computer Interaction and Natural Language.

projects.title: Gamer Galaxy
projects.intro: An AR multiplayer gaming platform with all kinds of hypercasual games

projects.title: Mobile based XR Exposure Therapy
projects.intro: A mobile application to perform exposure therapy using Cardboard Headset and Smartphones.

projects.title: Meetme
projects.intro: Meet me is a Puzzle based hypercasual game currently on Google Play Store.

projects.title: Disco Maniac
projects.intro: A hypercasual game about a guy who does not want to stop dancing while giant boxes attack him!

projects.title: AR Science Lab
projects.intro: SmartAR is a new way of doing labs with inbuilt AR experiments to help students perform experiments.

projects.title: Zombie land
projects.intro: A motion shooter game where you move and shoot zombies trying to attack you and defend yourself!

projects.title: Ball in Hole
projects.intro: Roll the ball into the hole using on screen controls. Uncover exciting levels and challenges!

projects.title: Indoor AR Navigation
projects.intro: An indoor AR based Navigation System with an added AR treasure hunt game.

projects.title: Covitopia
projects.intro: AR Simulator for the spread of infectious diseases and a predictor for the number of cases.

projects.title: Semi Automated Wheel chair
projects.intro: This project is aimed at developing a working model of a semi-autonomous wheelchair.

projects.title: IOT based Home Security System
projects.intro: In this project we developed working model of a Home Security Systems using an ESP32.

projects.intro: An AI assistant Extension to support your workflow in Docker Desktop using GPT 4 Turbo

projects.title: GUI Molecule Editor using RDKit
projects.intro: A way to graphically represent and build Molecules using RDKit for Chemformatics

projects.title: Genetic Algorithm trained Racing Car
projects.intro: Research on mutation, crossover and selection algorithms to train a Racing Car

description: Ideated and Developed a content marketing platform - Guided Tours. It helps the business deliver personalized and engaging content to their target audience and analyze their engagement. This product saved the company $500,000 per year by replacing outsourced technology PathFactory.
Developed features for Oracle Content Cloud including Video Transcription (viewing and editing) and importing/exporting site packages from the Cotent Cloud.
Mentored an intern for the period of two months and helped her build a Video Annotation system on the Oracle Content Cloud.
Developed an email parser to generate summary reports about the emails the people from the BU received. This innovation saved roughly 140 hours of work on yearly basis.
Developed dashboard and automated report generation for business units to expedite the data consumption. This process saved the company another 200 hours an year.
Researched the automation of analysis of peer banks 10K and 10Q declaration to generate a peer bank performance report.
